name: Pig in the Woods
description:
Pig in the Woods

A short pixel art project for Game Tech! Developed in 2019.

Bounce around and collect coins as trusty Mr. Placeholder Pig! Explore a colorful pixel-art woods in high velocity. How much money you can accumulate?

Disclaimer: This was a small solo-developed game prototype made for a class. As such, it was developed in a very short period of time and will likely have many bugs!

How To Play:

WASD to move

Space to jump (double-tap to double jump)

Collect yellow stars to progress to the next level!

Credits:

  • Michelle Nie (Artist/Programmer)
